title: Forget Madden. The Hottest Game in the N.F.L. Is Chess.
description: Athletes, known for being gamers, often find ways to compete during their downtime. Football players who tackle chess are drawn to the mental challenge that runs against stereotypes in their sport.

media:credit: Maddie Malhotra for The New York Times
media:description: John Urschel, a former N.F.L. offensive lineman, has worked as an analyst for a Chess.com tournament.
